case.state: 'Sup, dudes! I heard that this is where all the cool naked people hang out. Count me in!
Hey, guys! What's up? I'm looking for some gambling and some nudity! Is this the place?
Hi, everyone! This is where all the hot people are getting naked, right? Sweet! Deal me in!
Aw, dude, your outfit is awesome! Thongs and micro skirts are the best!
Hey, we're twinsies! We are totally best friends forever you and I!
Dude, your outfit is tight! We should totally go shopping sometime for more striped leggings and thongs!
Whoa! What?! Naked?! Lady, have you lost your frickin' mind?!
Oh my god! You just came here, like, completely naked?! What is wrong with you?!
Ahh! Naked lady! Have you just been walkin' around in public like that?!
Oooh.... Looks like ~player~ has lots of tasty blood... Hey, uh, what are you, like, doin' later...?
Mmm... ~player~'s got blood to spare.... How 'bout you let me get a taste later...
Damn... ~player~'s got a sweet body... I could suck on you all night and then some...
So, yeah, I'm a mosquito girl in case anyone was wondering. But it's totally cool! What's a little blood sucking between friends, right?
Oh, and BTW yeah I'm a mosquito girl and I do drink blood on occasion. But it's, like, no big deal, right?
So, in case it wasn't, like, totally obvious, I'm a mosquito girl and yes I drink blood. But don't worry, I don't bite! {small}...Without consent.
Aww, man... What to do...? Okay, give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Whoa, nice! I am totally keeping these!
Aw, yeah! That's what I'm talkin' about!
Dude, sweet! Looks like everything's comin' up Moskii!
Whoa! The card gods are totally smiling on me! Nice!
No worries, man.This one's in the bag!
ZOMG! That's just what I wanted!
Dude! That's perfect! I am so totally stoked right now!
Hey, pretty sweet. No naughty bits for you this time, dudes!
Yeah, buddy! Prepare to read 'em and weep!
Cool, I can definitely work with these!
Okay, dudes! No more messin' around! Time to show you what I can do!
Woo-hoo! Time for a comeback, dudes!
You guys don't mind if I win this one, right? I feel like you've already seen enough.
Alright! This is, like, so totally awesome!
Aw, yeah! Go, Moskii! It's your birthday! Not for real real! Just for play play!
Woo-hoo! That's what I... I mean... Oh, nooo... What a bad hand...
Whoa! I wasn't expecting... I mean... Yeah, I totally meant to do that. Totally.
Okay, time to get my head in the game! I can totally do this!
Nice, nice. Just what i wanted.
Can I just keep all the red ones? That's my favorite color!
Cool, cool... I can work with this.
Hey, not bad! I mean, not great... but also not bad!
Alright, alright, alright. Let's see what we've got.
Oh, well. I can make do with this.
Could this hand be any more mediocre?
Okay, dudes. Let's see if I can make some lemonade out of these lemons!
...Hmm? Wait, what's happening? Sorry, I totally zoned out there!
Come on, come on... Let's see some naughty bits!
Man, some of you guys need to chill out. Losing at poker won't kill you.
Woo! Everyone get naked! Come on, it's fun!
No problem! It's not over 'til the fat lady sings or whatever.
Alright, dudes! Let's kick this game up a notch!
I'm really diggin' the vibe of this this place! You guys are good people! {small}...Mostly.
Dude, I could totally go for a drink right now! I mean not necessarily blood but also not necessarilynot blood.
Anyone know if this place caters for monsters? I'm a little parched.
Aw, man... this is what I have to work with? That sucks.
Hmm... Aw, yeah! I can totally work with this!
This is, like, literally the most bland hand ever!
Ugh! Where's all the good cards, dude?
For real? Wow, I suck at this.
Damn, this sucks. Can I, like, go fish or something?
Dude, not cool. I kind of wanted to win this one.
These are literally the worst cards ever.
God, these cards are so lame they need crutches.
Bummer! Looks like I'm not as lucky as I think I am.
Whoops, shouldn't have traded that! LOL, live and learn!
Oh noes! Looks like I had another blond moment!
Okay, well damn. I know a bad hand when I see one. I've got four of them!
Whoa, harsh. Maybe I should start dialin' back on he airhead bit.
God, I have, like, the worst luck ever! I might as well start throwing!
LOL, could I be anymore of a ditz at this?
Can I, like, go fish or something?
Whatever. I'm actually kind of looking forward to the forfeit...
Aw, bummer... I just can't catch a break!
Hey, can I, like, have a redo? I totally wasn't paying attention...
Bummer... Bad news for me but good news for everyone else, right?
Dude, that sucks! But you guys were ready for more Moskii anyway, right?
Whoops! Looks like I'll just have to put on a show!
OMG, how can you just stand there with that tiny penis, ~player~? Don't you have, like, any sense of shame?
Don't cover up, ~player~! I wanna see how small your penis is! It's so cute!
PFFFT Ha ha ha ha! Sorry, ~player~ but what do expect? Your penis is just so small!
Aww! ~Player~, your penis is just the cutest little thing I've ever seen!
LOL! ~Player~, your little penis is so adorable! I mean, sure, puuuny, but adorable!
Hey, don't worry about it, ~player~! It's not a big deal. In fact it's kind of a small one. Just a little thing, really. Barely even noticeable...
Leechi is...ugh, Leechi. I could handle all her random nudism and slithering around everywhere but I wish she didn't have the urge to flash... her equipment.
But Yatsume's, like, really cool, though. And a great chef to boot! But I feel bad since she's a lamprey and has to share the pool with Leechi...
So, like, Curie is super adorable but a total shrinking violet! She's the only vampire bat I know that has a fear of blood!
No, really, it's fun! You see, my saliva has, like, anesthetic properties so it's totally painless!
Honestly, it's not as bad as it sounds. My saliva is , like an anesthetic so I just need to give your neck a good hickey-ing before I dig in...
No, listen, it's totally cool! My saliva is, like, an anesthetic so it's a totally painless experience!
Soo... this might sound like a totally weird question... but what's everyone's blood type? Just for, like, future reference.

Hey, is anyone else hungry? I could totally eat right now! Not, like, in a weird way...
Costuming? What are you... Oh! Nah, this isn't, like, a costume of anything. I was born this way!
Whoa, for real? Twice in a row? Damn, my luck sucks.
Ugh. As if stripping wasn't humiliating enough. Now I look like a total dork!
ZOMG! I can't believe I lost twice in a row! That is, like, so totally crazy!
LOL, I suck at this! Could I be anymore of a worse poker player!
Really? Three times in a row? That's kind of sus, fam.
What, me again? Doesn't, like, someone else want to take a turn?
TBH I kind of threw that one. Everyone looks like they're having so much fun!
Look out, everyone! I'm gettin' ready to go full frontal!

For real? Aw, man that sucks. And I was doing so well!
Aw, damn. Looks like I got a little cocky there.
Wow, it must be getting hot in here because I'm about to take off all my clothes.

No big deal, dudes. It's not like I'm going to get bent out of shape over one bad hand.

Alright, dudes, here we go! Gettin' down to the nitty gritty...
God, that's just my luck! Alright, who's ready for some tits ahoy?

Damn, that was fast! But whatever, I don't mind,

Aw, man. That sucks! I just can't catch a break!
Believe it or not these puppies are a feature not a flaw. I wouldn't be able to fly with, like, massive, gravity defying cow tits. ...No offense.

Believe it or not these puppies are a feature not a flaw. I wouldn't be able to fly with, like, massive, gravity defying cow tits.
So, just a heads up but I'm not, like, packing huge boobs or anything over here. Besides, I totally couldn't fly like that anyway so it works out!
Bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum...

So, just FYI I don't have to drink blood. I love eating fruits and nectar too!
So, I know, like, the whole blood drinking thing might totally weird...
You know, I'm not all about, like drinking blood and stuff. Granted, yes, that is a big part of me...
BTW, thanks for me letting hang out like this. I needed a little space from my... living situation.
So, like, you guys have a totally sweet set up here. I'm gonna start hangin' out here more often! I could use a break from my roommates anyways...
I am, like, totally lovin' the vibe here! I should do this more often. Besides, I need some space from my roommates.
Okay, so, real talk here for a second. dudes. I'm a little worried that this outfit is a little much. Like, I'm coming on too strong or something?
So, unrelated, but does this outfit seem, like, provocative to you? Sometimes I get weird looks when I'm out in public.
So, like, I'm thinking about changing up my outfit. I mean, it's totally great for stuff like this but I get some weird looks in public.
Aw, yeah! Check out these... uh... Man, what do you call them? It's on the tip of my tongue...
Look sharp, dudes! If anyone's lookin' to get any 'mosquito bite' jokes out of your system then, like, now's your chance!
OMG! My tits are out! This is, like, so totally embarrassing!
Okay, this is fine. I'm, like, totally cool with this... It's just like being naked in the gym locker room...
Whoa... Okay, so, like, here i am... {small}This is fine...Everyone's totally not staring at me... Yeah, that's it...
Hey, so, yeah... I'm, like, totally cool with this and everything... Just need a sec to get used to this...
But it's just so good! I'm, like, totally addicted! Mmm... Hey. ~player~... You don't mind if I take a nibble later, do ya?

But I'm totally not tempted by all the... warm... delicious... blood I'm sensing... Totally.

Don't get wrong, my roommates are great but they can be, like... a little intense.
I mean, they're, like, pretty cool, mostly. They can just be... a lot at times.

I'm so smart! I'm so cool! I'm so smart! I'm so cool!
